content.raw:
I suspect that will result in broken code since it looks like maybe the zaber api is a wrapper around serial read/write - in which case it will be stringy.

I think we have some of these stages lying around, I might leave this as a pull request until I have a chance to test.

Or at least I'll check out the zaberapi to see what it's doing.
